attributes.action: Abolish adult fare on buses and railway for under eighteens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Adult fare on bus and railway networks is applied when a customer is over sixteen years of age. However adult priveledges such as drinking, voting and even adult minimum wage are not given until eighteen. Therefore classing sixteen year olds as adults is untrue and wrongly justified. I would like to abolish all adult fare on buses and railway for people under the age of eighteen.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/childfaresext/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
